page.subtitle: This is the project page for {projectName}. Here you can view all information about the project. You can also view the documents and items linked to this project.

status-form.title: Project Status
status-form.description: Update project status to reflect the current state of the project. After selecting the desired state press the update button to persist the change.

dates-form.title: Project Dates
dates-form.error: An error occurred while updating dates

owner-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to change the project owner

owner-form.description: Update project owner. After selecting the desired owner press the update button to persist the change.
owner-form.note-content: Only the owner or an admin can change the project owner.

commercial-offer.unauthorized: You are not authorized to view this page

form.error: An error occurred while generating the file
form.title: Commercial Offer
form.description: Generate a commercial offer document for the project
form.company-name-description: Enter the name of your company. This name will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.address-description: Enter the address of your company. This address will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.country-description: Enter the city and country of your company. This is the country you will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.phone-nm-a-description: Enter the primary phone number of your company. This is the phone number will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.phone-nm-b-description: Enter the secondary phone number of your company. This is the phone number will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.email-description: Enter the email address of your company. This email will be displayed on the commercial offer document.
form.offer-validity-in-days-description: Enter the number of days the offer is valid for. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.
form.payment-advance-description: Enter the percentage of the advance payment. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.
form.delivery-period-description: Enter the delivery period of the project. This will be displayed on the commercial offer document terms.

schema.offer-validity-number: Offer Validity must be a number
schema.payment-advance-number: Advance Percentage must be a number

form.supplier-field-description: Select the supplier to add to the project. If the supplier does not exist, you have to create it from the Suppliers tab first.
form.price-field-description: Enter the price of the item.
form.currency-field-description: Select the currency of the price.
form.quantity-field-description: Enter the quantity of the item.

schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.phone-number-min-length: Phone number must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.phone-number-max-length: Phone number must not be longer than {maxLength} characters

form.error: An error occurred while adding the user
form.title: Add User
form.description: Enter the details of the user you want to add.
form.username-field-description: User's username must be at least 4 characters long and must be unique. It cannot contain spaces or upper case letters. The user will use this username to login.
form.name-field-description: Enter the name of the user. This is the name you will be using to identify the user in the app. It is preferable to use a first name and a last name separated by a space (e.g. John Doe).
form.email-field-description: Enter the email address of the user. This email will be used in commercial offer document if the user is the project owner/manager.
form.phone-number-field-description: Enter the phone number of the user. This phone number will be used in commercial offer document if the user is the project owner/manager.
form.role-field-description: User's role determines what actions they can perform in the app. Admins can perform all actions, while users can only perform limited actions. Admins can also add and edit users.
form.password-field-description: User's password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.

schema.username-min-length: Username must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.username-max-length: Username must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.email-max-length: Email must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.phone-number-max-length: Phone number must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.password-min-length: Password must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.password-max-length: Password must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.verify-password-min-length: Verify Password must be at least {minLength} characters
schema.verify-password-max-length: Verify Password must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
schema.username-not-valid: Username must not contain spaces or Uppercase letters
schema.password-complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

page.title: Edit User
page.subtitle: This is the edit page for the user: {userName}. Here you can edit the user details.

change-name-section.name-min-length: Name must be at least {minLength} characters
change-name-section.name-max-length: Name must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
change-name-section.error: An error occurred while updating the name
change-name-section.title: Name
change-name-section.description: Change the name of the user, The avatar initials depend on the name. it is preferable to use a first name and a last name separated by a space.

change-email-section.email-max-length: Email must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
change-email-section.error: An error occurred while updating the email
change-email-section.title: Email
change-email-section.description: Change the email of the user. This email will be used in the commercial offer documents if the user is the project owner/manager.

change-phone-number-section.phone-number-max-length: Phone Number must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
change-phone-number-section.error: An error occurred while updating the phoneNumber
change-phone-number-section.title: Phone Number
change-phone-number-section.description: Change the phone number of the user. This phone number will be used in the commercial offer documents if the user is the project owner/manager.

change-role-section.error: An error occurred while updating the role
change-role-section.title: Role
change-role-section.description: Change role of user, Careful not to change your own role to a lower role which would result in loss of access to the admin panel. Once saved the changes will take effect once the user logs out.

change-password-section.password-min-length: Password must be at least {minLength} characters
change-password-section.password-max-length: Password must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
change-password-section.verify-password-min-length: Verify Password must be at least {minLength} characters
change-password-section.verify-password-max-length: Verify Password must not be longer than {maxLength} characters
change-password-section.password-not-complex: Password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
change-password-section.error: An error occurred while updating the password
change-password-section.title: Password
change-password-section.description: Change the password of the user, Password must be at least 8 characters long and must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
change-password-section.note-revoke: If you want to revoke the user's access you can deactivate their account below.
change-password-section.note-settings: Use this feature only if the user forgets their password. If the user just wants to change their password, they can do so from their user's settings page while logged in. They can find the settings page by clicking on their avatar in the top right corner of the application.

deactivate-user-section.error: An error occurred while deactivating the user
deactivate-user-section.title: Deactivate User
deactivate-user-section.description-a: Deactivate the user, this will prevent the user from logging in and accessing the Application. Once deactivated the
deactivate-user-section.description-b: changes will take effect after the user logs out.
deactivate-user-section.description-c: If you want the changes to take effect immediately, you need to restart the server, better call the IT administrator.
deactivate-user-section.description-d: The user will still appear in the list of users, but will not be able to login or access the application. You can reactivate the user at any time.

activate-user-section.error: An error occurred while activating the user
activate-user-section.title: Activate User
activate-user-section.description: This user is currently deactivated, this means that they are unable to access the application using their credentials. Activating the user will re-allow the user to login using their credentials and access the application.

name-form.error: An error occurred while updating name
name-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to change the {type} name
name-form.title: Name
name-form.description: Update {type} name, this will change the name of the name of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated name press the update button to persist the change. Name of the {type} must be unique.
name-form.note-with-owner: Only the owner or an admin can change the {type} name.
name-form.note-without-owner: Only an admin can change the {type} name.

description-form.error: An error occurred while updating description
description-form.title: Description
description-form.description: Update {type} description, this will change the description of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated description press the update button to persist the change. The {type} description is one of the fields used to search {type}s.

notes-form.error: An error occurred while updating notes
notes-form.title: Notes
notes-form.description: Update {type} notes, this will change the notes of the {type} across all references and the previous notes will be lost. After typing the updated notes press the update button to persist the change.

delete-form.required: Name is required to delete the {type}
delete-form.unauthorized: You do not have permission to delete the {type}
delete-form.title: Delete
delete-form.description: Are you sure you want to delete the {type}? This action cannot be undone.

form-info.description: Please type the name of the {type} to confirm. After typing the name press the delete button to delete the {type}.
form-info.warning-content: Deleting a {type} is permanent, you will not be able to undo this action.
form-info.project-note-content: Only an admin or an owner can delete a project.
form-info.note-content: Only an admin can delete a {type}.

registration-number-form.max-length-message: Registration number must not exceed {maxLength} characters
registration-number-form.error: An error occurred while updating registration number
registration-number-form.title: Registration Number
registration-number-form.description: Update {type} registration number, this will change the registration number of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated registration number press the update button to persist the change.

website-form.error: An error occurred while updating website
website-form.title: Website
website-form.description: Update {type} website, this will change the website of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated website press the update button to persist the change.

field-update-form.field-min-length-message: Field of Business must be at least {minLength} characters
field-update-form.field-max-length-message: Field of Business must not exceed {maxLength} characters
field-update-form.error: An error occurred while updating field
field-update-form.title: Field of Business
field-update-form.description: Update {type} field of business, this will change the field of business of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated field of business press the update button to persist the change.

type-update-form.type-min-length-message: Type must be at least {minLength} characters
type-update-form.error: An error occurred while updating type
type-update-form.title: Type
type-update-form.description: Update {type} type, this will change the type of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated type press the update button to persist the change.

make-update-form.error: An error occurred while updating the make
make-update-form.title: Make
make-update-form.description: Update {type} make, this will change the make of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated make press the update button to persist the change.

mpn-update-form.description: Update {type}'s MPN, this will change the MPN of the {type} across all references. After typing the updated MPN press the update button to persist the change.
